mapper.sql: t.id, t.name, t.parent_ids AS parentIds, t.parent_id AS parentId, p.name AS parentName, t.type, t.path, t.url, t.enabled, t.sort, t.icon, t.redirect, t.cacheable, t.require_auth AS requireAuth, t.component, t.remarks, t.create_by AS createBy, t.create_date AS createDate, t.update_by AS updateBy, t.update_date AS updateDate, t.del_flag AS delFlag, t.permission AS permission, (select count(*) from sys_menu s WHERE s.parent_id=t.id) as hasChildren
LEFT JOIN sys_menu p ON p.id = t.parent_id
mapper.update: update sys_menu set parent_ids= CONCAT(#{newParentIds},substring(parent_ids, length(#{oldParentIds})+1,length(parent_ids)+1)) where parent_ids like concat(#{oldParentIds}, '%')
mapper.delete: delete from sys_menu where parent_ids like concat(#{oldParentIds}, '%')
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT
from sys_menu t
LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm on t.id=rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id=ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id= #{userId} and t.type <> 3 and t.enabled = 1 ORDER BY sort

LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm on t.id=rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id=ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id= #{userId} and t.enabled = 1
